Author: caribou#3049
Content: Anyway, I have a noob question. Which is the point of staking? I don't get that as it is a PoW coin

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: technically not staking

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: details here - https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000024428-komodo-5-active-user-reward-all-you-need-to-know

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: note `Active` User Reward. Funds must move monthly to receive reward.

Author: caribou#3049
Content: @smk762 -  dracocanis ominator Thx bro. I see the reward plan in that link. I was meaning about how does staking contributes to the project? Something to do with consensus or what?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: It really depends on what you mean by staking. The 5% KMD reward is not staking. You an however stake chains liek OUR.

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: do you mean to ask what's the purpose of the reward?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: or KMDLABS when we luanch that

Author: caribou#3049
Content: @Gordon Komodo exactly 🙂

Author: Gordon Komodo#7477
Content: simply to reward holders  😄

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: incentive to hold and use, rather than pump and dump

Author: caribou#3049
Content: Ok, so "staking" has no impact at protocol level?

Author: caribou#3049
Content: Fair enought

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content: it isnt part of consensus

Author: smk762 -  dracocanis ominator#7640
Content:
PoW does consensus, and DPoW checkpoints it to BTC at a relatively low cost to Notary Nodes. Notary nodes are rewarded by occasional period of easy mining. Active user reward balances holder value vs Notary mining reward advantage. 
Election is currently underway, some more info here - https://komodoelection.com/1-about/notary-node-incentives/

Content: @smk762 -  dracocanis ominator thx buddy
